com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2MaterialOpaqueSingle.Builder<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2MaterialOpaqueSingle.Builder<M>
  • Enclosing class:
    R2MaterialOpaqueSingle<M>

    public static final class R2MaterialOpaqueSingle.Builder<M>
extends Object
    Builds instances of type R2MaterialOpaqueSingle. Initialize attributes and then invoke the build() method to create an immutable instance.

    Builder is not thread-safe and generally should not be stored in a field or collection, but instead used immediately to create instances.

      • from

        public final R2MaterialOpaqueSingle.Builder<M> from(R2MaterialOpaqueSingleType<M> instance)
        Fill a builder with attribute values from the provided R2MaterialOpaqueSingleType instance. Regular attribute values will be replaced with those from the given instance. Absent optional values will not replace present values.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance from which to copy values
        Returns:
        this builder for use in a chained invocation
